title: Football at the 1984 South Asian Games
text:
The men's <a href="association%20football">football</a> tournament at the <a href="1984%20South%20Asian%20Games">1984 South Asian Games</a> was held from 18 to 21 September 1981 in <a href="Kathmandu">Kathmandu</a>, <a href="Nepal">Nepal</a>. 
<a href="Nepal%20national%20football%20team">Nepal</a> won the tournament by defeating <a href="Bangladesh%20national%20football%20team">Bangladesh</a> in the final.
Group Stage.
All the results entered are same as found in 
Group stage.
